Shadows

Neptuno has three levels of shadow. You can use shadows in all components :)

Level 1
Level 2
Level 3

<div class="shadow-1">Level 1</div>
<div class="shadow-2">Level 2</div>
<div class="shadow-3">Level 3</div>
